tool.name: SourceBatchCheckTool
tool.summary:
Use this tool to check the source files in the source batch directory (e.g., D:\process_data\source_batch) before starting work on the batch. The tool performs the following checks:

1. Missing files – Identifies any missing components of Shapefiles or GeoTIFF files.

2. Unexpected files – Detects files that do not belong to any Shapefile or GeoTIFF set.

3. Oversized files – Flags .shp or .tif files larger than 2 GB.

The results of these checks are logged in a file, for example:

D:\process_data\log\process.log
tool.usage:
1. Displaying a source batch directory, eg. D:\process_data\source_batch

2. Clicking Run, results will be in processing log file
